Name: Hide and Run
About the game: In Hide and Run players are divided into two teams. Props and Hunters. Props are trying to hide long as possible and hunters are trying to find props. Customizable match settings such as match time, hiding time and props starting health. Change physical appearance to props that can be found in the map. Tries to hide long as possible. Special abilities such as smoke and whistle Tries to find all props before time runs out. Randomly selected or via team selection When the prop is eliminated, it joins hunters team. Special ability which shows if props are nearby
